summary.Title: Fitter for varying packaging tasks
summary.Presentation:

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for two employees to our fitting department which is solving tasks for our customers.

As our new colleague in the fitting department, you will be solving packaging tasks on different sites in Denmark. The working hours are usually between 7am-16pm.

About ASAPack A/S:

ASAPack employs around 50 persons in Denmark. The team is a mix of different cultures and competences. We are growing and have been busy ever since our start in 2011. We solve a wide range of tasks. Our customers are both medium-sized Danish companies and large international companies.

We expect you to be:

  • In good physically shape
  • Willing to work on different sites in Denmark
  • Persistent to deliver quality
  • Proactive and adaptable in a fast-pace environment
  • Hardworking
  • Flexible. Some days are busy, and it may be necessary to complete the day's tasks. Most days, however, end at normal time
  • You speak Danish or English

We offer:

ASAPack is a growing company. You will be faced with many different challenges, and you will have the opportunity to take responsibility to the extent you want. Our culture is characterized by fighter will, humor and high ambitions for the company. You will have a direct influence on the task and gradually be given more responsibility.

The positions will be filled as soon as possible, and we will conduct interviews on a running basis.

Note only applications with: CV, application, and a picture, marked "fitter" will be considered: We look forward to receiving your application, which is sent to rekruttering@asapack.dk
